snippet.title: Swordsman VR - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games
snippet.description:
Swordsman is a realistic sword-fighting game with challenging opponents and epic boss fights. Experience real combat that requires strategy against armored, physically simulated enemies that can parry, riposte, step, and dodge in this action-packed, award-winning game!

Approach every fight like a real duel. Parry enemies and strike them when they're weak! Realistic weapons and armor physics challenge you in this visceral combat experience.

See Knights, Vikings, Mongols, Samurai, Pirates, ships in the Caribbean, a Kraken, epic boss fights, nine different combat environments, dismemberment, armor physics, hand-to-hand combat, advanced weapon handling, player progression and RPG elements, dozens of armors / weapons / shields, zombies, the ability to slow time down (and other modifiers), official events with huge prizes, and more!

Visit the Blacksmith to purchase weapons or take down powerful bosses to unlock their unique weapons and special abilities as you gear up for increasingly difficult fights on your quest to defeat the Jötunn.

Visit the Skill Master to upgrade your stats and skills and the Armorer to equip yourself with better armor. Be strategic and build your ideal character to suit your unique playstyle.

Master the blade and become the ultimate Swordsman in VR!

#psvr2 #psvr2games 

Rated Mature
